DOC.brief_summary: The aim study examine effect nattokinase supplementation hemostatic factor nondiabetic hypercholesterolemic subject . Collagen-epinephrine closure time , prothrombin time , activate partial thromboplastin time , fibrinogen level , lipid profile measure baseline 8-week follow-up .
DOC.criteria: Age 20 69 year Hypercholesterolemia ( 200mg/dL ≤ serum cholesterol ≤ 280mg/dL ) Nondiabetic ( fast blood glucose < 126mg/dL 2hour blood glucose < 200mg/dL ) Use medication supplement Diagnosis dyslipidemia , diabetes mellitus , hypertension , liver disease , renal disease , cardiovascular disease , pancreatitis , cancer , lifethreatening illness require regular medical treatment Women pregnant , breastfeed intend become pregnant study period Drug alcohol abuse
